Large-scale system multi-terminal Modular micro-frontend architecture

Completely decoupled, independently deployed, and not restricted by the front-end technology framework. Supports large-scale system front-end architecture solutions that integrate multiple subsystems into one main system.

Automatic import of various components, intelligent checking of TS syntax errors and prompts can give you a better development experience.
